title: Betrayal Academy
description: The dramatic conclusion to The Boys of Westview Academy series!Stephanie Montgomery: I never thought it would go this far. I never imagined this to go beyond a mean girls game of cat and mouse between two high school rivals.But it did. And one night, one day, that's all it took to shake my very world to the core and destroy everything I thought I knew about the people I loved the most.I was about to suffer the greatest betrayal of all.Would I survive this time and get my happy ending?Or would they break me, once and for all?
author: Mina Thorne
